title: Problems with Ping in the new Patch
body:
I always had a ping of 25-30 ms maximum, the new patch launched and now im getting over 200ms for some reason...

My provider is TPG and my tracert to 103.240.227.1 is:

Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7601]
Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.


Tracing route to 103.240.227.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  192-168-1-1.tpgi.com.au [192.168.1.1]
  2    13 ms    14 ms    12 ms  10.20.22-149.tpgi.com.au [10.20.22.149]
  3    23 ms    25 ms    23 ms  203-219-5-241static.tpgi.com.au [203.219.5.241]
  4    22 ms    22 ms    23 ms  nme-apt-bur-crt2-te-gi-0-7-0-2.tpgi.com.au [203.219.106.13]
  5    25 ms    23 ms    22 ms  203-219-106-221.tpgi.com.au [203.219.106.221]
  6    26 ms    22 ms    23 ms  syd-gls-har-dom1-be-20.tpgi.com.au [203.29.129.197]
  7   209 ms   200 ms   200 ms  203-219-106-254.tpgi.com.au [203.219.106.254]
  8     *      229 ms     *     104.160.156.35
  9   201 ms   203 ms   200 ms  104.160.156.103
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11   202 ms   202 ms   202 ms  103.240.227.1

Trace complete.

Riot please help!

replies.body: Ok so I contacted TPG and they said that they only take care of the connection until hop 6, hop 7 through to 11 is you guys. So please can any rioter help with this issue? Or anyone?

wow dude... looks like the TPG network between hop 6 and 7 are screwed up.
Good idea to give them a call

Hey thanks for the reply. So what should I tell them then as I have no idea what to say? Do I just mention that I am lagging in league of legends to the tech support? or mention the IP im pinging? or the hop?
